attributes.action: Reinvest university profits back into grassroots education.
attributes.background: Funding for primary and secondary schools is at an all time low, whilst universities are thriving from the fees they receive from both domestic and international students. If a percentage of the university profits made was reinvested, our schools could properly invest in our children.

rejection.details:
We understand that you would like to see university profits reinvested in education, but we are not sure how you would like this to happen.

You could start a new petition calling for the Government to introduce a tax on university profits if that is something you would like to see happen.
